resources.string: Playback Section by Day of Week...
Playback Time by Day of Week...
(Applied when the schedule is not selected)
Apply last end time to all
Apply last ref. time to others
Apply last start time to all
(Effective when this schedule is included in the other integration schedule)
Copying file to the temporary folder...
(If empty, the preferred channel is selected automatically)
(This file need to be separately copied as the same folder/file names per STB)
Playback Time Information by Day of Week
Playback Times by Day of Week
Pin this item to the list
Unpin this item from the list
(When it is changed, it is applied after the program restarts)
Select several holidays: [Ctrl] + click the mouse
(Set 24 hour playback: enter the same start and stop times as \'00:00\')
The slide show ended. If you want to finish it, please click the mouse.
If you try to start synchronization, please press the [Proceed] button in the right side.
(After completing transfer to the STB, it is automatically set to the playback guide screen)
(For transfer, please use the function of [Trasfer Playback Guide Image] of the [Etc] tab)
Getting Content Sync Info from Server
Result of Getting STB/PC Info from Server
Result of Getting Content Sync Info from Server
Result of Reporting Content File Existence
Please select this when you try to make the backup file in advance before contents files are initialized because of reinstallation of SignCast Manager later.
It is recommended to create the backup file about contents files periodically.
The backup file made through this menu can be restored through the menu of \'Restore Content\'.
The current contents files and thumbnail files are made into a compressed file.
If you try to restore contents, the backup copy which was created before is required.
Restoration of contents is processed by the method to import the contents backup copy files after intializing them.
This operation cannot be cancelled while it is being performed or later.
The backup file which was in advance created is reflected in SignCast Manager.
Drag content file(s) from the Explorer, and drop into this space.
Creating thumbnail and/or calculating playtime required.
Please select this when you copy scedules and contents in the STB/PC equipmnet manually through storage media.
The player copies the schedule and contents included in the schedule package file in the STB/PC equipment through the menu of Import Schedule Package from the installed one.
The schedule and the contents included in it are made into a compressed file.
Please select this when the equipment is connected to the network.
If the contents file already exist, you can transfer contents files newly by selecting the option of \'Overwrite if same file exists\'.
The schedule and the contents included in it are copied in the target equipment by file unit through network connection.
You can send your opinions to questions or improvements of SignCast.
Please see this User\'s Guide about using BBMC SignCast.
You can find resources which is helpful for learning the basic functions quickly.
Users designate the default values of contents, slide shows, and other settings of program.
Zoom the presentation so that the slide fills the window.
Show adjustable drawing guides to which you can align objects on the slide.
To include all content types to expand the scope of the search.
Open announcement window to register announcements.
Audio type is included in the scope of the search.
Specify the property values of the auxiliary schedule.
Bring the selected object forward so that it is hidden by fewer objects that are in front of it.
Bring the selected object in front of all other objects so that no part of it is hidden behind another object.
Component type is included in the scope of the search.
Playback Section by Day of Week
Set playback section and reference time by day of week.
Set Playback Section by Day of Week
Toggle the Content Explorer panel view.
Delete all contents are registered in the content repository, and initialize the content repository.
Copy the selection and put it on the Clipboard.
Cut the selection and put it on the Clipboard.
Flash type is included in the scope of the search.
Turn on gridlines to which you can align objects in the slide.
Image type is included in the scope of the search.
Open monitoring window to monitor STBs.
Add a frame that can contain some content files.
Add a section to the presentation.
Add a slide to the presentation.
Paste the contents of the Clipboard.
PowerPoint type is included in the scope of the search.
Add an analog clock to content repository.
Add an animated text to content repository.
Add an audio clip to content repository.
Add a component to content repository.
Add a date and time to content repository.
Add a digital clock to content repository.
Add a document slideshow to content repository.
Add an executable application to content repository.
Add a flash clip to content repository.
Add an image to content repository.
Add a full-screen webpage to content repository.
Add a Naver map to content repository.
Add a news subtitles to content repository.
Add a PowerPoint presentation to content repository.
Add a RSS feed to content repository.
Add a streaming URL to content repository.
Add a text to content repository.
Add a TV, camcorder, or other external video input to content repository.
Add a video(movie) clip to content repository.
Add a worldwide weather to content repository.
Add a webcam video clip to content repository.
Add a webpage to content repository.
View the rulers, used to measure objects in the slide.
Send the selected object behind all other objects.
Send the selected object backward so that it is hidden by the objects that are in front of it.
Start the slide show from the current slide.
Start the slide show from the first slide.
Streaming type is included in the scope of the search.
Text type is included in the scope of the search.
Toggle the view of content thumbnails in slide.
View the ad track log after slide show ending.
Set tracing enable ad track among current schedule contents if you need to record.
Open capture / TV tuner card setting window.
Video(Movie) type is included in the scope of the search.
Webpage type is included in the scope of the search.
Restore Content From Schedule Package File
Only the content files in the selected schedule package file will be restored.
Restoration of contents is processed by the method to import the content files from schedule package file after intializing them.
This operation cannot be cancelled while it is being performed or later.
The content files including all the media files and description file are reflected in SignCast Manager.
If there is no any contents in Manager PC when PC-based synchronization is processed, all the existing contents which can exist in the server are deleted.

On the basis of contents in the server, contents of Manager PC is synchronized (server-based synchronization) or on the basis of contents in Manger PC, contents of the server is synchronized (PC-based synchronization).
If you try to save the schedule in the server, please select the menu of \'Save Schedule to Server\'.
The schedule file which was saved in advance in the server is opened.
Please select this when you try to deploy the schedule that work is completed in the server.
PC-based synchronization should be performed in advance. If synchronization is not done, PC-based synchronization is automatically performed.
For the purpose of deploying the schedule that work is completed, the stand-alone schedule file is created and transferred to the server.
Please select this when you try to share the same schedule with other manager users with the SignCast Server account.
The schedule saved through this menu can be opened through the menu of \'Open Schedule from Server\'.
The schedule file that you are working is saved in the server.
To log in the server, you should have the SignCast Server account in advance.
The information on Server URL, ID, Password, and site name can be obtained through the server manager.
Log-in and log-out are performed in the SignCast Enterprise Server.
If you try to perform this operation, the information of the STB/PC which was registered in the server is required before.
The STB/PC information cannot be registered, updated, and deleted in SignCast Manager, all the operations are performed in the server.
The STB/PC information registered in the server is reflected in SignCast Manager.
The player copies the schedule and contents included in the schedule package file in the STB/PC equipment through the menu of Import Schedule Package from the installed one.
Do you want to exit SignCastV2 Agent?
As the connection test was successfully performed, correction of information related to the server was successfully performed.

Connection should be successful by clicking the button of \'Test Connection\' so that the server port and the site name can be automatically changed. Do you want to perform the connection test right now?
There is a server information error, internet connection is closed, or normal communication with the server cannot be performed now. Please try again later.
The display time of announcement should be more than 5 seconds.
The display time of announcement cannot be 0. Please check the display time.
The same section name which was filled already exists. Please enter another name.
While the product was being registered, an unexpected exception occurred. Please try again later.
The authentication key value is valid, but expired. Please enter another authorization key value.
SignCast 2.x.24.0 or later can be authorized. Please firstly install with version 2.x.24.0 or later.
The applicable authentication key was used already. Please enter the exact authentication key value.
The applicable authentication key was not registered. Please enter the exact authentication key value.
The current auth. key({0}) is not effective, and the revoking the key in the server was failed.
The revoking of the authentication key({0}) was done successfully.
After creating the frame automatically, the contents that drag-and-drop is done were added.
It was added in the slide background audios list.
It was registered as the slide background image.
Do you want to register this as the slide background image?
Creation of contents backup copy file was completed.
While contents backup was performed, an exception occurred. Please try again.
Update downloading which is being now performed will be cancelled and this window tries to be closed. Do you want to go ahead?
Synchronization which is being now performed will be cancelled and this window tries to be closed. Do you want to go ahead?
The current schedule file must be saved for contents intitalization. After saving the schedule file firstly, please start this function again.
Contents initialization cannot be cancelled after starting. Do you want to continue this?

As it is different from the inforamtion in product registration or the server authentication information was changed, the existing product registration information is initialized. Please perform product registration firstly.
There is a collision between other schedule settings. Please check playback time of the applicable date and day of the week.
The job was performed successfully in all the selected STB/PCs.
The job was performed successfully in SOME of selected STB/PCs. There are the STB/PC that is not performed successfully.
While the configuration file was reading, an exception occurred. Please check the target configuration file again.
The reading of the configuration file was done successfully.
While the configuration file was saving, an exception occurred. Please try it again.
The saving of the configuration file was done successfully.
The selected STB/PC will be deleted. Do you want to continue this?
As the file which was registered with the same name already exists, the name of new contents was changed to the unique name.
You can delete the other section except the topmost section.
The contents which are being used in the current schedule cannot be deleted. Please close the current schedule and try this function again.
While contents restoration was performed from the server, an exception occurred. Please try it again.
While the contents file was being copied, an exception occurred. Please check the location of the target file or the disk volume.
While the contents file was created, an exception occurred. Please check the location of the target file or the disk volume.
The target file was not selected. Please select the exact file firstly.
\'Product registration\' was not done or it was initialized. Please perform product registration first.
After installing Adobe Flash Player ActiveX, please try this function again.
After selecting the schedule firstly through the schedule gallery menu, please designate the settings of integration schedule.
The format of your MAC address is wrong(Format: XX-XX-XX-XX-XX-XX).
The STB/PC is not now connected to the network. Please check network connection.
The same IP address which was filled already exists. Please enter another IP address.
- Webpage will be displayed in kiosk mode on the slide show and player.
The same MAC address which was filled already exists. Please enter another MAC address.
One cycle time should be more than [{0}] so that it can be rotated normally.
The same name which was filled already exist. Please enter another name.
The first slide of section cannot be appended to new section.
After creating or selecting the slide of work target, please try this function.
The audio contents cannot be added as the frame of the slide. Instead it was added in the slide background audios list.
New software update came out. Click here to update now.
Please enter the authentication key values of 12 digits.
No content file found to download.
The executable file information of the application program is wrong. Please select the exact file firstly.
Empty value or letters of \ / : * ? ">< > and | cannot be included in name. Please enter the exact name.
Letters of \ / : * ? ">< > [ ] and | cannot be included in name. Please enter empty value or the exact name.
The playback time information is wrong. Please select the exact file firstly.
Please enter or select the schedule name.
The STB/PC was not selected or the wrong IP and/or port number was set in the STB/PC.
The size information is wrong. Please select the exact file firstly.
The size or playback time is wrong. Please select the exact file firstly.
The number of PowerPoint slides should be more than 1.
There is no difference between manager PC and server, there is no need to be synchronized.
Please enter the URL of the webpage.
Because usual volume is not specified, all of the time volumes will be deleted.
Empty value is not allowed as the value of item. Please enter the real value.
At least one \'This Schedule\' must exist.
While the schedule file was reading, an exception occurred. Please check the target schedule file again.

The total {0} items which were not found in the contents files included in the schedule file were replaced by ghost content or deleted(in the case of background audio). Please check the opened schedule file.
While the schedule file was opening from the server, an exception occurred. Please try it again.
The manager PC-based synchronization is required before you try to do this function.
The playback time/size information was automatically extracted. If you try to reflect it in the contents, please click "save".
The total playback time of the section must be less than 100 hours. Please update the playback time of content and/or slides and try this function again.
Playback time of contents cannot be 0. Please check playback time of the included content.
After installing Microsoft PowerPoint, please try this function again.
Please select Powerpoint viewer(PPTVIEW.EXE) which supports Microsoft PowerPoint 2010.
The duration of product usage is expired. Please register product firstly.
The power of the selected STB/PC will be turned off. Do you want to go ahead?
The selected STB/PC will be rebooted. Do you want to go ahead?
The selected STB/PC will be changed to the sleep mode. Do you want to go ahead?
The option to need restart of the program was changed. Will you restart it now?
Restoration of contents was done successfully.
The current schedule file must be saved for restoration of contents. After saving the schedule file firstly, please try this function again.
Restoration of contents cannot be cancelled after starting. Do you want to go ahead?
While restoration of contents was being performed, an exception occurred. Please try again later.
The start and end time of playback time cannot be the same with each other. Please check again.
The start and end time cannot be the same with each other. Please check again.
Do you want to save the changes in {0}?
The same file name which was filled already exists. Do you want to continue this by overwriting?
While it was being saved to the file, an exception occurred. Please try again.
The number of slides should be more than one so that you can save.
It was saved to the server successfully.
Please enter the name of stand-alone schedule file.
While it was being saved in the server, an exception occurred. Please try it again.
Please enter the name of schedule file.
After saving the schedule file that you are working in the local or server firstly, and please try again.
The target data was reflected successfully in the selected STB/PC.
After selecting the schedule firstly through the schedule gallery menu, please designate the playback section and referece time by day of the week.
The chosen update file does not exist on the server. Please try again later.
You have not logged on the server. After logging on the server, please try this function again.
The current schedule file must be saved for content synchronization. After saving the schedule file firstly, please try this function again.
Synchronization of content files between the server and Manager PC was done successfully.
The synchronization of Manager PC\'s repository information with server\'s information({0}) has completed.
The synchronization of STB/PC information was done successfully.
The FTP server information or the connection mode is wrong. Or internet connection may be closed.
After adding content in the slide firstly, please designate the ad track content.
After selecting the schedule firstly through the schedule gallery menu, please designate the ad track content.
The transfer operation of the schedule package file was done successfully.
While the content files were being transferred, an exception occurred. Please try again.
The number of slides should be more than one so that you can save and send file.
Sorry for the inconvenience in usage of the SignCast. The program restarts because of unexpected exception.
Import of the schedule package file was done successfully.
While the document slide show file was being read, an exception occurred. Please try again.
While importing the schedule package file, an exception occurred. Please try it again after checking if the one of content files is opened.
The current schedule file must be saved for program update. After saving the schedule file firstly, please try this function again.
Update downloading has been completed, and downloaded install program will be executed. Do you want to go ahead?
While the update version was being downloaded, an unexpected exception occurred. Please try again later.
While transferring content backup to the server, an exception occurred. Please try again later.
Please enter the backup name, please try this function.
Please select Microsoft Internet Explorer(iexplore.exe) or Google Chrome(chrome.exe).
The object got out of the work area. It was automatically moved into the work area.
Internet connection is closed or product registration / validation check cannot be performed now. Please try again later.
There is an network error or you received the abnormal data from the selected STB/PC. Please try again later.
The target file doesn\'t exist or the file content was wrong. The file could be damaged.

As it is different from the inforamtion in product registration or the server authentication information was changed, the existing product registration information was initialized. Please register product firstly.
It\'s the wrong URL or is out of service now. Internet connection may be closed.
Please perform "Add" function after entering one of the date or day of the week.
There is no user account with the information that you entered. Please enter the exact item values.
Internet connection is lost or communication with the server cannot be performed now. Please try again later.
Internet connection is lost or communication with the server cannot be performed.
It\'s the wrong URL or the destination streaming server is out of service. Internet connection may be closed.
For channel values, you can enter just numbers or the character \'-\' and \'-\' must be between numbers.
It\'s the wrong URL or the destination webpage is out of service. Internet connection may be closed.
The creation of schedule package file was done successfully.
(Visit the World Weather Online, register \'Weather API Key\' and confirm \'Weather City\')
(Select the .exe file of Microsoft Internet Explorer or Google Chrome)
Playback Time by Day of Week
Settings: Playback Section by Day of Week
Import Schedule Package File(s) From USB Device
Installing and Setting Up Flash Player
Playback Section by Day of Week
Moderate or heavy showers of ice pellets
Patchy light rain in area with thunder
Moderate or heavy rain in area with thunder
Patchy light snow in area with thunder
Moderate or heavy snow in area with thunder
Screen Off was removed from Device Administrators list
Screen Off was added as Device Administrator
Turns the screen off and locks your device with a single touch.
Screen Off application was not marked as Device Administrator. Please check Security settings.
Import of the schedule package file was done successfully.
While importing the schedule package file, an exception occurred. Please try it again after checking if the one of content files is opened.
The creation of schedule package file was done successfully.
Unable to load contents temporarily due to memory shortage
Can not decompress due to insufficient memory.
